Package org.alexk.dao

Class AbstractDAO<T extends BaseModel>

java.lang.Object
org.alexk.dao.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - tipul modelului folosit pentru efectuarea operatiilor CRUD
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomerDAO, OrderDAO, OrderItemDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T extends BaseModel>
extends java.lang.Object
Clasa generica care se ocupa de operatii CRUD pe modele
